title: Italicized
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725123443im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Philippe%20Font_4213.jpg)
  
Hello,  
I'm looking for this font, here likely written in italic. Could you please help me to identify it ?  
Thanks in advance.
author: Philippe 7

comments.content:
It's a font called **Chaucer** or **Ingrid (Ingenius)**  
Read the following threads to find more about it:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/72168](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725123443/http:/typophile.com/node/72168 "http://typophile.com/node/72168")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/19732](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725123443/http:/typophile.com/node/19732 "http://typophile.com/node/19732")
See Canada Type's [Messenger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725123443/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/messenger/) for a high quality rendering - including alternates.
